entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
